Initializer# init(accessControl:authenticationContext:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
init(
    accessControl: SecAccessControl = SecAccessControlCreateWithFlags(nil, kSecAttrAccessibleAfterFirstUnlockThisDeviceOnly, [], nil)!,
    authenticationContext: LAContext? = nil
) throws
```
